text: William C. Henderson (September 16, 1857 in Baltimore, Maryland - October 27, 1929 in Fullerton, Maryland) was a Major League Baseball manager for the 1884 Baltimore Monumentals of the Union Association. He won 58 games and lost 47 during the one season that the Monumentals existed. The team finished in 4th place in the Association. ==External links== *Baseball Reference Category:1857 births Category:1929 deaths Category:Major League Baseball managers Category:Sportspeople from Baltimore
title: Bill Henderson (manager)
